title: In case of Regional Plan area, premium to be paid for additional FSI shall be 5% of the land rates for the said land as prescribed in Annual Statement of Rates without applying guidlines and shall be paid to the Government through District office of the Town Planning and Valuation Department
clause_text: In case of Regional Plan area, premium to be paid for additional FSI shall be 5% of the land rates for the said land as prescribed in Annual Statement of Rates without applying guidlines and shall be paid to the Government through District office of the Town Planning and Valuation Department.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
